text: 11.35 1 Kin 17.17-24, 2 Kin 4.25-37, Apo 22.25 Bɨ ogɨnap kumɨlak okok, kɨli tepayaŋ tɨkjakel bin okok kɨlop dɨtep gɨlak. Bɨ ogɨnap, bɨ mɨlɨk nɨgɨlak okok kɨli bɨ anɨb okok kɨlop nag lel kumɨlak. God nop kelɨgebɨlap, kɨlop wɨsɨb yokel kɨm abɨlap ak pen, tɨkjakɨl pelpel mɨdtep yɨbɨl yonɨgun agɨl, God nop chɨgɨl nep yelak. Anɨb ak tek, bɨ mɨlɨk nɨgɨlak okok kɨli kɨlop gɨ tɨmel gel gel kumɨlak.
